-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Aviones"
(
    "idAviones" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Modelo" text NOT NULL,
    "Peso" text NOT NULL,
    "Capacidad" bigint NOT NULL,
    "idHangares" bigint NOT NULL,
    "idPiloto" bigint NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idHangares")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Hangares"
(
    "idHangares" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Capacidad " text NOT NULL,
    "Locacizacion" text NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("idHangares")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Piloto"
(
    "NroLicencia" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Restriccion" text NOT NULL,
    "Salario" bigint NOT NULL,
    "Turno" text NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY ("NroLicencia")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Aviones"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("idHangares")
    REFERENCES public."Hangares" ("idHangares") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Aviones"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY ("idPiloto")
    REFERENCES public."Piloto" ("NroLicencia") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
